track.name: Black Coffee
comments: Love it!  Peggy Lee did the Lady and the Tramp soundtrack I think.
really cool number..
FritzDeMers, Horny little critter aren't you? Oh, I see, you mean't grind some coffee! So sorry! Anyhow, great song, great singer, and I agree fully with what Bonzo_Alfalfa, down below, says.
Let's grind some!
she was indeed a beautiful lady...with an super voice....!
Her voice is as beautiful as she is. Gorgeous.
An interesting tid bit is that Ed Sullivan played trumpet on this song! Actually I'm lying but hey the important thing is that this is a great song and that Peggy Lee was a great great singer!
